name: Destroyer's Blessing
text: Breaking things adds to your power.
prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.
benefit: When you are raging and you succeed at a sunder combat maneuver, you regain 1 round of rage. If the sunder attempt causes the object to gain the broken condition, you heal 1 hit point. You can only gain these benefits once per round.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to regain 1 round of rage after reducing a foe whose CR is at least half your character level to below 0 hit points, rather than upon successfully sundering a target.
prerequisites_zh: 半兽人或兽人，【狂暴】职业特性。
benefit_zh: 当你处于狂暴中并且成功进行破武战技之后，你的狂暴轮数恢复1轮。如果击破武器战技使物件处于破损状态，你会恢复1点HP。这些效果每轮只能获得1次。
staminaText_zh: 无需破武，而只要将CR不低于你一半的目标HP降低到0，你就可以花费2点耐力获得1点每日狂暴轮数。
